collectionProcessors.name: Sort_OLIs_by_Product_and_Date
collectionProcessors.label: Sort OLIs by Product and Date

rules.name: Total_Price_is_not_Zero_or_Blank
rules.label: Total Price is not Zero or Blank

formulas.name: CalcTerm
formulas.expression: IF( ( {!Calculate_Revenue_from_Schedules.ScheduleDate}>= ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate},-1) && {!Calculate_Revenue_from_Schedules.ScheduleDate}<= ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate},11)), "YR1", IF( ( {!Calculate_Revenue_from_Schedules.ScheduleDate}>= ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate} ,11) && ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate},11) <= ADDMONTHS({!varTermEndDate},1) && {!Calculate_Revenue_from_Schedules.ScheduleDate}< ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate},23) ), "YR2", IF( ( {!Calculate_Revenue_from_Schedules.ScheduleDate}> ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate} ,23) && ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate},23) <= ADDMONTHS({!varTermEndDate},1) && {!Calculate_Revenue_from_Schedules.ScheduleDate}< ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate},35) ), "YR3", IF( ( {!Calculate_Revenue_from_Schedules.ScheduleDate}> ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate} ,35) && ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate},35) <= ADDMONTHS({!varTermEndDate},1) && {!Calculate_Revenue_from_Schedules.ScheduleDate}< ADDMONTHS({!varTermStartDate},47) ), "YR4", "n/a" ) ) ) )

formulas.description: Amount for the first SLI. Amount - (MRR * (Contract Months -1)) {!Get_Opp.Amount} - ( ({!Get_Opp.Amount} /{!Get_Opp.Contract_Months__c}) * ({!Get_Opp.Contract_Months__c}-1))
formulas.name: SLIAmount1st
